metadata.title: Fortinet - Block URL
metadata.description: This playbook allows the SOC users to automatically response to Azure Sentinel incidents which includes URL's, by adding the URLs to the Sentinel URL blocked group. [Learn more about Threat Intelligence in Fortinet policy](https://www.fortinet.com/fortiguard/threat-intelligence/threat-research)
prerequisites: 1. Sentinel URL block group should create in the VM.
2. FortinetConnector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same subscription.
3. Fortinet-GetRestAPIFunctionAPP needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same subscription.
4. FortinetConnector need to be authenticated with an API key.
5. This playbook will add new address object to existing VM.

Address_group_details.description: This gets the address group details from fortinet

Check_address_object_is_already_exist_in.description: Getting the address object details from firewall

Append_to_array_variable_for_new_address.description: This appends address object to array variable for new address object

Condition_to_check_if_user_chosen_Block_.description: This check if user chooses Block URL

Append_to_array_variable_URL_address_act.description: This appends the array variable action taken on URL

Condition_based_on_user_inputs_from_the_.description: condition to check the submit action is block / unblock or Ignore

value.text: The URL  @{items('For_each_malicious_URL')?['url']} is already a member of the blocked address group

Append_to_adaptive_card_if_URL_is_a_memb.description: This appends the text to display If URL is a member of blocked address group

Filter_array_address_objects_to_remove_f.description: This filter is used to remove address objects if already exist

value.text: The URL  @{items('For_each_malicious_URL')?['url']} is not a member of the blocked address group

Append_to_array_variable_address_object_.description: This appends address object members to existing members

Set_dynamic_variable_action_name_to_bloc.description: variable to set action name dynamically

Condition_to_check_if_URL_already_presen.description: condition to check the malicious URL address is present in the predefined address group

Filter_array_address_name_from_address_g.description: This filters the address name of address object from address group

value.text: The URL @{items('For_each_malicious_URL')?['url']} is not a member of the blocked address group

Append_to_adaptive_card_body_if_URL_is_n.description: This appends the text to display If URL is not a member of blocked address group

Append_to_address_group_members_in_case_.description: Appends address objects to existing object

For_each_new_URL.description: iterates on address object body for each new URL

Set_variable_action_name_to_Block_URL.description: This sets the variable block URL

Condition_to_check_if_URL_address_alread.description: This checks if URL is a member of any of the list of address objects
